price: To Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and all that is on earth. Indeed, Allah encompasses all things.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
